title: Rs 32.45 lakh crore finance pledged for India's renewables sector: Pralhad Joshi
description: Union New & Renewable Energy Minister Pralhad Joshi has called on investors to support India's renewable energy sector, highlighting commitments of Rs 32.45 lakh crore in financing and significant capacity additions. The country aims for 500 GW by 2030, with substantial increases in solar and wind capacities.
